None.Name: Root
None.Description: Enable to become immobile and gain: Rain of Razorleaves, Linked Fire

None.Name: Rain of Razorleaves
None.Description: Every 5 seconds, unit releases volleys of razor-sharp leaves that deal 50 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 70 in total. Has a long range of 50m.

None.Name: Linked Fire
None.Description: Up to 7 entities connected to the root network support each other enabling more powerful attacks.

en.Description:
Lifepoints +140
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +300
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +220
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

ru.Description:
Lifepoints +140
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +300
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +220
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Extra.en: Each unit (buildings do not count) in the Root Network increases the amount of projectiles of the Rain of Razorleaves,  increasing its damage by roughly 550,  up to a maximum of 6 additional units at U3.
